Package com.example.eventlotteryapp.EntrantView

Class EventsListRecyclerViewAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventsListRecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
com.example.eventlotteryapp.EntrantView.EventsListRecyclerViewAdapter
public class EventsListRecyclerViewAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<EventsListRecyclerViewAdapter.ViewHolder>
RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of events in the EventsListFragment. Supports filtering by search query, category, and date. Maintains separate lists for original events and filtered events. Handles asynchronous loading of organizer names and event images from Firestore.

    • filter

      public void filter(String query)
      Filters events by search query with title priority. Events matching the query in the title appear first, followed by events matching in the description.
      Parameters:
      query - the search query string (case-insensitive)

    • updateList

      public void updateList(List<? extends EventItem> newList)
      Updates the adapter with a new list of events. Replaces both the original and filtered lists with the new data.
      Parameters:
      newList - the new list of events to display

    • getFilteredList

      public List<EventItem> getFilteredList()
      Gets the current filtered list of events.
      Returns:
      the filtered list of events

    • applyCategoryFilter

      public void applyCategoryFilter(String filterType)
      Applies a category filter to the event list. Filters events based on keywords in title and description matching the category.
      Parameters:
      filterType - the category to filter by: "sports", "music", "workshops", "free", "community", or "all" (case-sensitive)

    • applyDateFilter

      public void applyDateFilter(int year, int month, int day)
      Applies a date filter to show only events on or after the specified date. Events without a start date are excluded from the filtered results.
      Parameters:
      year - the year to filter by
      month - the month to filter by (0-11, where 0 is January)
      day - the day of the month to filter by
